channel.title: healthy on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in healthy on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Standing Desk Experience: Days 2-4
item.description: I’ve been standing at work all week. My heels hurt by the end of each day and I’m starting to see what my boyfriend meant by needing the softness for the feet.

item.title: Standing Desk Experience: Day 1
item.description: I’ve been reading about how sitting is bad for you for several months now but after reading one more article a couple of days ago, I decided enough is enough, I’m going to make a standing desk, get used to it and live longer.

item.title: For Now
item.description: October 2008 This yellow evening, Winds tell of rains to come. A healthy, happy wind That I havenâ€™t felt for so long. Dry mango leaves
